title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: ACT-Based Online Education for Therapist Coaching Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five coaching events of the ACT framework and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can conduct parent coaching by utilizing learner-centered goal-setting and reflective practice techniques.
Learners can continuously assess and improve coaching competencies through a feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
